title: Step By Step How To Build Your Own Aquaponics System In Backyard

tasks.task: Assembling an aquaponics system at home
subtasks: Welcoming and thanking viewers for their interest
Explaining what aquaponics is (combination of hydroponics and aquaculture)
Highlighting the benefits of aquaponics (sustainability, synergy, affordability)
Emphasizing the customizable nature of the system
Reminding viewers to follow key principles in the manual
Stressing the importance of proper fish and biomass management

tasks.task: Following a step-by-step guide for constructing a basic aquaponics system
